themes: separation of funding streams for legacy and emerging organizations
importance of legacy organizations for community stability
interdependence between legacy organizations and emerging artists
loss of significant arts organizations as a warning
key_phrases: arts funding might be split into two different funds
one for legacy organizations and their ongoing programming and one for emerging artists and their projects
Legacy organization are important to the stability of the arts in Austin
Losing Big Medium was a tragedy that should have been avoided
barriers_identified: risk of losing legacy organizations due to insufficient support
solutions_proposed: split arts funding into separate funds for legacy organizations and emerging artists
allow legacy organizations to apply for project-specific funding from the emerging artists fund
